snippet: Ayasdi, a Big Data start-up, is based on years of mathematical research led by Gunnar Carlsson, a Stanford professor. The company says its technology allows users to see significant patterns in large business and scientific data sets without having...
abstract: Ayasdi, a Big Data start-up, is based on years of mathematical research led by Gunnar Carlsson, a Stanford professor. The company says its technology allows users to see significant patterns in large business and scientific data sets without having to know what questions to ask.

headline.main: Ayasdi: A Big Data Start-Up With a Long History
